income_messages:
From: l***********1@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-17 20:11:03
SUBJECT: Dearest one,
Dearest one,
How are you doing today? I am Antonie Williams, I am a sick woman who
was diagnosed with cancer six years ago. My Doctor told me that I
would not last for the next Two months due to a cancer problem.
My main reason for contacting you is because I want to entrust a
charity project to you, I know this may sound so strange to you and
also extremely risky for me to offer such a proposal to a total
stranger via email but this is my last resort to get this done.
I am looking for a confidant, someone to help fulfill my last wish. I
want a good person that will use this fund for orphanages, widows,
propagating the word of God and to endeavour that the house of God is
maintained.
I will appreciate your selfless act towards the less privileged, I
don’t mind if you could be of trustful help. I will be waiting to read
from you urgently as time is of essence due the limited time I have
and my ill health condition.
Thanks and Remain blessed in the Lord.
I am waiting to hear from you soon.
Mrs Antonie Williams
From: l***********1@gmail.com
To: ga60250@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-17 20:58:41
SUBJECT: Re: Dearest one,
Dear brother in Christ,
How are you doing? I’m so glad to hear from you. Well, I want you to know
that you will never regret getting involved in this project, I am a
fulfilled person and I know seeing this actualized within my lifetime will
make me more fulfilled and accomplished without any regret.
This project I suppose requires commitment and dedication and most of all
someone with the fear of ALMIGHTY GOD.
At this point as a religion daughter, I am standing to repose my trust and
confidence in you which means that I can trust you in every way and I have
decided to trust you like a brother and you also have to assure me that you
will do everything possible within your powers to conclude this project
successfully within a short period of days as that will glading my heart
either alive or when am gone.
However, one problem is that due to my present condition, I might not be
available to always communicate with the finance/security company in charge
till the successful conclusion of this project as I sometimes go on
medication that would not permit me to communicate often. However, for this
reason, I will need you to work things out with my family attorney who will
act as the intermediary between yourself and the finance company stating
you as my supposed next of kin / recipient of my family estate.
At this point our long family legal adviser will take up this duty and
ensure that everything is perfected between you and the paying bank for a
successful release.
For personal reasons, I would not disclose to the attorney the purpose that
I appointed you, which is to use the fund to set up a charity organization
for the poor and the needy. I will want to keep this confidential from
anyone, even my late husband's family except you and I.
Please I will be glad that you send me the below information and scan a
copy I.D of yours in your response so that I will at least have the
opportunity to forward your information out to the attorney and also to see
your picture and also pray for you and your family for eternal mercy.
Full Name:, Full Address:, Age:, Occupation:, Phone number:,
Private-Email:, Scan copy I.D/ Driver's license, Present Country:
I shall await your immediate response and suggestion before we proceed.
Waiting to hear from you.
Mrs Antonie Williams
From: l***********1@gmail.com
To: ga60250@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-21 09:58:28
SUBJECT: Re: Dearest one,
Hi Edward, how are you doing? I am waiting to hear from you after my last
mail, kindly provide the request information so I can send the contact of
the lawyer.
I am waiting to hear from you soon
